primary_play.rationale: Higher win rate, positive EV all scenarios, aligns with oversold RSI

key_findings.call_advantage: Calls show 35-41% win rate vs 20-35% for puts
key_findings.vol_sensitivity: Both plays highly sensitive to volatility expansion
key_findings.time_decay_risk: Extreme theta risk due to 0DTE expiration
key_findings.gap_risk: Overnight positions vulnerable to gap moves

position_sizing: 2-3% of account per trade due to high total loss probability
